text:

title: Example Analysis

The primary question I aim to answer is [insert research question here]. This analysis is aimed at an audience interested in [describe audience].



The data comes from [link to dataset source]. A data dictionary is available at [link to data dictionary or include one below].



Using dplyr and tidyr, the data has been wrangled and cleaned.



Below are some visualizations created with ggplot2: 1. Plot 1 - [Describe plot] 2. Plot 2 - [Describe plot] 3. Plot 3 - [Describe plot with faceting]

Note: This analysis references three sources, which can be found in the accompanying .bib file.




In conclusion, [summarize your findings here in 4-6 sentences].

title: About
text:
I am a student at Johns Hopkins, studying biostatistics and honing my skills in data science and statistical programming. My background is rooted in data analysis, with a strong interest in statistical methodologies and command-line workflows.



My current focus is on statistical programming, command-line tools, and the development of websites for data presentation and analysis.



Outside of academics, I enjoy [mention a hobby or interest here, optionally including a related photo if you’re comfortable sharing].

title: Home
text:
Guan Gui’s Photo




Hello! I am Guan Gui, currently pursuing my ScM in Biostatistics at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. My work is driven by a strong passion for biostatistics, spatial genomics, and machine learning, with a focus on deriving insights from complex biomedical data.




Master of Science in Biostatistics (ScM)
Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
2024 – Present
Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Data Science
University of Sydney
2021 – 2024
Graduated with First Class Honours
Awards: Vice Chancellor’s Global Mobility Scholarship, Dalyell Scholar, Charles Perkins Centre Summer Research Scholarship
Semester Exchange
National University of Singapore
Aug 2022 – Dec 2022
Completed core modules in statistical computing, programming methodology, and discrete mathematics.
Summer & Winter Schools
Shanghai Jiao Tong University
2022 - 2023
Advanced coursework in time series analysis, statistical inference, and stochastic processes.






Developed the “SpatialFeatures” algorithm to capture cellular-level features for spatial genomics, enabling insights into gene distributions at both super-cellular and sub-cellular levels. Created an R package to facilitate broader applications in spatial genomics.



Led a project utilizing deep learning models, specifically Vision Transformer (ViT), to classify frozen mouse brain cells. This project integrated advanced image processing and interactive Shiny apps, achieving top marks in my capstone course.



Simulated disease spread in network models using the SIR framework, demonstrating the effects of network structure on infection dynamics and peak spread rates.



Applied machine learning techniques, including LDA and Random Forest, for breast cancer diagnosis, achieving high predictive accuracy through rigorous validation methods.



Built a machine learning ensemble model to predict Airbnb prices, employing SHAP for interpretability and Bayesian optimization for fine-tuning. Offered insights into key price influencers for Airbnb hosts and real estate investors.





Data Analyst Intern
DiAct Technology Co., Ltd. (Ipsos), Shanghai, China
Jan 2022 – May 2022
Analyzed automobile data from social media, improving data extraction efficiency by 30% through Python optimization, and developed insights on consumer trends for SAIC Volkswagen and Audi.
User Growth Intern
JD.com, Beijing, China
Jul 2021 – Sep 2021
Enhanced SQL procedures to optimize data processing, developed user behavior indicators, and improved recommendation algorithms for a more personalized user experience.





Programming: R, Python, SQL, SAS, Java
Tools: Quarto, Jupyter, Git, Tableau
Machine Learning: TensorFlow, scikit-learn, ggplot2, dplyr, tidyr
Languages: Chinese (Native), English (Fluent)




Feel free to reach out to me at ggui2@jh.edu.

Published on October 24, 2024
